name: Asheara's Ward
flavorText: These gloves represent the unspoken bond between Asheara and her mercenaries.
flavorTextHtml: These gloves represent the unspoken bond between Asheara and her mercenaries.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +100 Resistance to All Elements(3) Set:     
 +20% Life(4) Set:     
 Attacks cause your followers to occasionally come to your aid.
